Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SMALL BUSINESS
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Makes provisions relating to assisting small businesses
Summary: Allows for the division for small-business to advise on matters affecting micro-enterprises consisting of fewer than five employees; establishes the main street center grant program to create main street centers in each of the counties in New York state, with the exception of the five boroughs of New York city; requires the secretary of state to receive all rule-making documents in electronic format; relates to persons receiving copies of agency rule making notices.
LawCode: Amd ยง134, Ec Dev L; add ยง16-bb, UDC Act; add ยง102-a, Exec L; amd ยง202, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, the New York state urban development corporation act, the executive law and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to assisting small businesses in this state
